dt2.10:4.1: Rūpakkhandhena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi vippayuttā?
dt2.10:4.2: Te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:5.5: manāyatanena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā … pe …
dt2.10:5.7: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:6.6: phoṭṭhabbadhātuyā ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:6.7: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:7.5: maggasaccena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:7.6: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:8.6: purisindriyena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:8.7: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:9.1: Manindriyena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:9.2: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:10.4: domanassindriyena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:10.5: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:11.1: Upekkhindriyena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:11.2: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:12.10: avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:12.11: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:13.3: phassapaccayā vedanāya ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:13.4: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:14.3: kammabhavena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:14.4: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:15.1: Rūpabhavena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:15.2: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi tīhi dhātūhi vippayuttā.
dt2.10:16.3: paridevena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:16.4: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:17.16: ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:17.17: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:18.6: manasikārena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:18.7: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:19.2: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:21.3: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:22.2: dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:22.3: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:23.2: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:24.2: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:25.3: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:26.3: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi pañcahi dhātūhi vippayuttā. #3

dt2.10:27.3: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā. #4

dt2.10:31.2: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:32.1: Upekkhāsahagatehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:32.2: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:33.9: mahaggatehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:33.10: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:34.2: paṇītehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:34.3: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā. #8–12
dt2.10:35.1: Parittārammaṇehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:35.2: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:36.8: maggādhipatīhi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:36.9: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:37.1: Anuppannehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:37.2: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi pañcahi dhātūhi vippayuttā. #17

dt2.10:38.3: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:39.4: ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:39.5: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:40.2: anidassanasappaṭighehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:40.3: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:43.4: hetūhi ceva sahetukehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.10:43.5: sahetukehi ceva na ca hetūhi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.10:43.6: hetūhi ceva hetusampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.10:43.7: hetusampayuttehi ceva na ca hetūhi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.10:43.8: na hetusahetukehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:43.9: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:45.5: rūpīhi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:45.6: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:46.1: Lokuttarehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:46.2: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.
dt2.10:48.3: āsavehi ceva sāsavehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.10:48.4: āsavehi ceva āsavasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.10:48.5: āsavasampayuttehi ceva no ca āsavehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:48.6: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:49.2: āsavavippayuttehi anāsavehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:49.3: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.
dt2.10:51.8: parāmāsehi ceva parāmaṭṭhehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:51.9: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:52.3: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.

dt2.10:54.9: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:55.5: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:58.7: saṃkiliṭṭhehi ceva no ca kilesehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.10:58.8: kilesehi ceva kilesasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.10:58.9: kilesasampayuttehi ceva no ca kilesehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:58.10: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:68.5: saraṇehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi vippayuttā?
dt2.10:68.6: Te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
